disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

disobedience.question: Did I use words to belittle or mock the Church?

extracted_data_phrases: in paid work or other activities

uncharity.question: Have I let my emotions get the better of me, causing me to lose patience with others?

greed.question: Did I make accumulation of money and possessions a driving force in my life, such that it overshadows my trust in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make the pursuit of material possessions my primary driving force in life, potentially leading me to idolize wealth over trust in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Did you use your authority, influence, or position to mistreat others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeing them as full human beings deserving of respect and dignity
as full human beings deserving of respect and dignity
lust.question: Did you reduce others to mere companions for your social life, rather than seeing them as full human beings deserving of respect and dignity?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, assuming they were solely due to my own efforts and abilities, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in my career , finances , and relationships
autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my career, finances, and relationships, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: such as advancing in your career or achieving financial stability
presumption.question: Did you assume that your successes in life, such as advancing in your career or achieving financial stability, were solely due to your own efforts and determination, rather than acknowledging God's providence?
presumption.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: with the struggles and hardships that I often take for granted
envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others had to deal with the struggles and hardships that I often take for granted?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in your conversations and speak to others with impolite language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a manner that showed you lacked self - control and
incontinence.question: Did you speak to others in a manner that showed you lacked self-control and used language that was vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control when speaking to others, using language that was coarse or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

especially during social gatherings or events
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially during social gatherings or events?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Have I engaged in overindulgence in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, especially when it comes to using food or drink as a reward for myself?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing my friends ' or acquaintances ' private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing my friends' or acquaintances' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I engage in unnecessary work on a Sunday, thereby disrupting my family's day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

particularly in situations where I felt wronged or misunderstood
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage within myself, rather than seeking reconciliation with others, particularly in situations where I felt wronged or misunderstood?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

impurity.question: Have I used substances, practices, or objects to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Did you intentionally use certain practices, substances, or objects that could prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
